Windows Azure is in a great place, and Amitabh Srivastava is ready to move to a new phase in his career. He has done stellar work for the company and I will work to ensure a smooth transition with the Windows Azure team, said Steve Ballmer . It's thought that Amitabh Srivastava 's exit is connected to Microsoft's announcement that company veteran Satya Nadella would replace Bob Muglia as head of Server and Tools. CHRYSLER, FORD CAUTIOUS But on Monday Chrysler Chief Executive Sergio Marchionne said that industry-wide sales had fallen off in the final weeks of the month, which typically account for the bulk of sales. We've seen a softening of the U.S. market in the last couple of weeks, Sergio Marchionne told reporters on a conference call to discuss Chrysler's fourth-quarter results. Sergio Marchionne forecast a sales rate of near 12.4 million to 12.5 million vehicles for the month. Chrysler is 25 percent owned by Italy
